price: 29. Ciertamente, los pecadores incrédulos se reían de los creyentes (en la vida terrenal).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ajramū kānū mina alladhīna āmanū yaḍḥakūna
